    What is YOSHOP KKM?

    The new generation cash register YOSHOP KKM is a unique solution that helps businesses to process cash and non-cash payments and print fiscal receipts. Trading and accounting programs are easily connected to the cash register, no drivers and adapters are required.

    Yoshop KKM is integrated with Webkassa, which transmits fiscal data online and is registered in the state register of KKM

    By connecting YOSHOP KKM you get access to all the functions of Webkassa

    Interface

    Webkassa is simple and convenient. Your cashiers will easily find all the necessary functions and, after starting the program, they will start working in a minute.

    Reports

    Forget about the paper magazine, about filling out the "Cash Book" at the end of the working day. You can easily see the work of cashiers, cash transactions in your Webkassa application.

    Cash transactions

    Webkassa contains all the necessary traditional cash transactions. It's easy and simple to work with them. All operations are available in one click.
    - Sale / Purchase
    - Purchase / Return of purchase
    - Close shift
    - Withdrawal / Deposit

    Scaling and more

    Everything in one system. We value speed, quality and professionalism. Therefore, everything you need can be found in Webkassa.
    - Unlimited number of cash registers in the organization
    - Unlimited number of cashiers in the organization
    - Carrying out cash transactions from any device,
      browser compatible
    - Mobile application for Android and iOS

    Our Solutions

    YOSHOP POS Terminal

    Accepts all types of bank cards. Fixed commission with no turnover requirements. Linking an account of any bank in the Republic of Kazakhstan. Crediting money the next business day.

    150 000 ₸
    Learn more

    Personal Area

    Suitable for managing a convenience store, clothing store, coffee shop, restaurants, pharmacies, etc. Access 365 days a year from any device and from anywhere in the world.


    from 42 000 ₸
    Learn more

    YOSHOP KKM

    Prints fiscal receipts and accepts cash and non-cash payments. Fast connection and acceptance of all types of payments. Connect!



    from 3 000 ₸


    How to connect?

      To connect YOSHOP PAY acquiring, you need to leave a request on our website, after which we will contact you and discuss the details!

      We will answer quickly
